amendment.description: Amendment to the Greenwood amendment (A007) sought to terminate the title X family planning services program and to transfer $116 million of the proposed title X funding to the Maternal and Child Health block grant program and $77 million to the Community and Migrant Health Centers program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, made in order by H. Res. 208 and printed as amendment No. 2-2 in House Rept. 104-224 as a substitute to the Greenwood amendment, to terminate the Title X family planning services program and to transfer $116 million of the proposed Title X funding to the Maternal and Child Health block grant program and $77 million to the Community and Migrant Health Centers program.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Livingston to the Greenwood amendment (A007).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Livingston amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 221 (Roll no. 614).
